# IEditService interface

Given a prompt and an instruction, the model will return an edited version of the prompt.

```csharp
public interface IEditService
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [CreateEditAsync](IEditService/CreateEditAsync.md)(…) | Creates a new edit for the provided input, instruction, and parameters |
